{"id":332172421,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 years, 1 month","timestamp":1588231550,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/332172421/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int numSquareSum(int n) \n    { \n    int squareSum = 0; \n    while (n) \n    { \n        squareSum += (n % 10) * (n % 10); \n        n /= 10; \n    } \n    return squareSum; \n    }\n    \n    bool isHappy(int n) {\n         int slow, fast; \n  \n    //    initialize slow and fast by n \n    slow = fast = n; \n    do\n    { \n        //    move slow number by one iteration \n        slow = numSquareSum(slow); \n  \n        //    move fast number by two iteration \n        fast = numSquareSum(numSquareSum(fast)); \n  \n    } \n    while (slow != fast); \n  \n    //    if both number meet at 1, then return true \n    return (slow == 1); \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number","has_notes":false}
